short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to import App Store metrics from the Analytics reports so you can visualize it on Google Looker Studio™

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to import App Store metrics from the Analytics report so you can visualize it on Google Looker Studio™

**What you'll need in order to use this extension**

- An active Easy App Reports subscription
- Your App Store ****setup must be done before using the extension
- Access to an App Store Connect developer account (it must be the same one you configured at app.easyappreports.com

**How it works (see screenshots for more details)**

1. Open your "Apps" tab on App Store Connect (you must be logged-in)
2. Open this extension and login on your Easy App Reports account
3. Be ready to leave your tab open for a few minutes and don't do anything else
4. Click on the button to fetch your data and wait for the process to be completed
5. If you see a success message, go to Looker Studio
6. Add a new Data Source and pick "Chrome Extension" on the configuration page
7. That's it! Now you can visualize your "Analytics" report data on Data Studio

**Metrics you'll be able to import**

• Impressions
• Product Page Views
• Conversion Rate
• Total Downloads
• Proceeds
• Proceeds per Paying User
• Sessions per Active Device
• Crashes

**Dimensions**

• Date
• Device
• Page Type
• Region
• Country
• Source Type
• Product Page
• App Version

If you're not a customer yet, head up to [easyappreports.com](http://easyappreports.com) and subscribe to one of our plans today!

**Feeling lost?**

More details: [https://www.easyappreports.com/integration/app-store-connect](https://www.easyappreports.com/integration/app-store-connect)

Wiki and Support: [https://wiki.easyappreports.com/en](https://wiki.easyappreports.com/en)
